name: Mahi
greetingText: I've always loved your name, itâ€™s as beautiful as you are!
wishText: May all your dreams come true today and always!
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday, Mahi! I miss you and our talks. I hope this day brings you all the happiness you deserve.
text2: I had so much to say...
text4: I realized, I wanted to do something
